name: Mega-Corps
background: The Gangs of New Eden are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal gang wars on the streets of New Eden. These gangs are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular gang, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

spells.name: Cyberspace Vision
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 18", which friendly units get +6" range when shooting against once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Overload Electronics
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 12", which takes 2 hits with Scratch.

spells.name: Stimulant Shock
spells.effect: Pick up to four friendly units within 12", which get Steadfast once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Neurotoxin Cloud
spells.effect: Pick up to four enemy units within 6", which take 2 hits each.

spells.name: Corpo-Network Link
spells.effect: Pick up to six friendly units within 12", which get Cyber-Eyes Boost once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: EMP Blast
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 12", which take 2 hits with AP(1) and Shred each.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Shielded
specialRules.description: Units where all models have this rule get +1 to defense rolls against hits that are not from spells.

specialRules.name: Ranged Slayer Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Ranged Slayer. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Shred
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 1 to block hits, this weapon deals 1 extra wound.

specialRules.name: Cyber-Eyes
specialRules.description: When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, it gets +1 to hit rolls.

specialRules.name: Cyber-Eyes Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Cyber-Eyes Boost. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable in Melee Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Unstoppable in melee. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Fortified Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Fortified. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Scratch
specialRules.description: Against non-Hero units with Tough(3) or more, this weapon gets AP(+2).

specialRules.name: Surge
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 6 to hit, this weapon deals 1 extra hits (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Increased Shooting Range Mark
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which friendly units get +6" range when shooting against once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Versatile Reach Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Versatile Reach. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Rapid Advance Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Rapid Advance. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Slayer
specialRules.description: This model's weapons get AP(+2) against units where most models have Tough(3) or higher.

specialRules.name: Ranged Slayer
specialRules.description: This model's ranged weapons get AP(+2) against units where most models have Tough(3) or higher.

specialRules.name: Cyber-Eyes Boost
specialRules.description: If this model has Cyber-Eyes, it always gets +1 to hit rolls from Cyber-Eyes (instead of only when shooting over 9" away).

specialRules.name: Unstoppable
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and ignores all negative modifiers to this weapon.

specialRules.name: Fortified
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule take hits, those hits count as having AP(-1), to a min. of AP(0).

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Tough
specialRules.description: This model only rolls to check wound effects once it has taken at least X wounds, and is only Knocked Out on rolls of 5+X or more.

specialRules.name: Versatile Reach
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated, pick one effect: until the end of the activation all models with this rule in it either get +4" range when shooting, or move +2" when charging.

specialRules.name: Rapid Advance
specialRules.description: This model moves +4" when using Advance actions.

specialRules.name: Steadfast
specialRules.description: If a unit where all models have this rule is Shaken at the beginning of the round, roll one die. On a 4+, it stops being Shaken.
